entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -34.0°C
Wind: W 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
